fullText:
google ads auctions version-ai

- tell an agent to do something
- tool router selects n mcps that can do the job
- mcps have min/max budgets
- bid to win the tool call

tool selected cost: $0.01c

feels odd now but can see this being a thing (same with models i suppose)
